statement.p: Explain how to find the dimension of W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{\left[\begin{array}{r} 2 \\ -2 \\ 0 \\ -4 \\ 2 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 3 \\ 0 \\ 2 \\ -4 \\ 0 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 5 \\ -8 \\ -2 \\ -12 \\ 8 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -12 \\ 6 \\ -4 \\ 20 \\ -6 \end{array}\right]\right\}.
